to play dlc after you place the options file in the correct directory start your game normally ignore the offline warning and go into the game. youll see a new icon on the  minimap that looks like medical snakes intertwined and that starts new mission, and hit escape and go to inventory > outfits for the dlc outfits they will be there.
remember to backup your options and savegame file beforehand.
